official_title: Recognizing the Desert Shield-Desert Storm Memorial Light at the Shrine of Our Lady of Grace in Columbia, New Hampshire, as a memorial of national significance.

summary.text: Recognizes the Memorial Light at the Shrine of Our Lady of Grace located in Columbia, New Hamsphire, as a memorial of national significance.

titles.title: Recognizing the Desert Shield-Desert Storm Memorial Light at the Shrine of Our Lady of Grace in Columbia, New Hampshire, as a memorial of national significance.
